main event: A yellow or orange object the size of a basketball was observed traveling in a straight line from NW to SE in Buffalo, New York on 6-30-57.
interesting points: The object was observed for approximately 30 seconds.
The observation was made by a civilian source.
The object's speed was too fast for instrumentation data to provide conclusive evidence.
The sighting was categorized as a Ground-Radar observation.
The object was later identified as an ATIC P2P T64 and sent to Eglin AFB for further analysis.
sighted object: yellow or orange object the size of a basketball
